creator: sean.mullan@oracle.com
text:
There is no entry for the Base64Decoding exception message in
org.apache.xml.security.resource.xmlsecurity_en.properties

This causes errors when Base64Decoding exceptions are printed.

To fix, add the following line to
org.apache.xml.security.resource.xmlsecurity_en.properties :

Base64Decoding = Error while decoding

creator: raul-info@r-bg.com
text:

What do you mean?
